sql-script.name: script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_news_category ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), name varchar2(32 char) not null, text varchar2(32 char) not null, viewtemplate number(4) not null, mark number(4) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, description varchar2(256 char), oorder number(11) not null, primary key(id), unique (name), unique (parentid, text) );

create table sf_news ( id char(32) not null, categoryid char(32) not null, domain number(11) not null, cname varchar2(32 char), status number(4) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, topic varchar2(128 char) not null, keywords varchar2(128 char), author varchar2(32 char), source varchar2(32 char), recommendation number(11) not null, recommendationdate timestamp, recommendationduration number(11) not null, imagemark number(1) not null, contentmark number(11) not null, comments number(11) not null, lastcommentdate timestamp, allowcomments number(1) not null, indexed number(1) not null, views number(11) not null, description varchar2(256 char), content clob, oorder number(11) not null, primary key(id) );
create table sf_news_comment ( id char(32) not null, parentid char(32), contentid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, content clob not null, primary key(id) );
